name: Ben Is Angry (Red Potato Games)
description:
Ben is Angry is a violent skill-based platformer game, the main goal of the game is to finish a level while avoiding all dangerous obstacles that kill you instantly on touch.

The main character named Ben is you. Finish all 60 levels and conquer your inner demons – including epic BOSS battles! Collect all crystals scattered in all levels to unlock new outfits and compete in online leaderboards against your friends or the world. Test yourself in Arcade Mode! Be ready to die a lot, but don't worry! You will respawn and be back in action instantly.
